issue.title: google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.google.com/search?q=g2a&sca_esv=a0b6cc145a6c8085&sxsrf=ADLYWIIhIi9vVmvxvpiIPbYtU6m5yFqLrw%3A1730942434582&ei=4hUsZ5alI7KIi-gPkdSkoAo&ved=0ahUKEwiWnsKHh8mJAxUyxAIHHREqCaQQ4dUDCA8&uact=5&oq=g2a&gs_lp=Egxnd3Mtd2l6LXNlcnAiA2cyYTIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzITEC4YgAQYsAMY0QMYQxjHARiKBTINEAAYgAQYsAMYQxiKBUikBVD2BFj2BHABeAGQAQCYAQCgAQCqAQC4AQPIAQD4AQGYAgGgAgWYAwCIBgGQBgqSBwExoAcA&sclient=gws-wiz-serp](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dg2a%26sca_esv%3Da0b6cc145a6c8085%26sxsrf%3DADLYWIIhIi9vVmvxvpiIPbYtU6m5yFqLrw%253A1730942434582%26ei%3D4hUsZ5alI7KIi-gPkdSkoAo%26ved%3D0ahUKEwiWnsKHh8mJAxUyxAIHHREqCaQQ4dUDCA8%26uact%3D5%26oq%3Dg2a%26gs_lp%3DEgxnd3Mtd2l6LXNlcnAiA2cyYTIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzITEC4YgAQYsAMY0QMYQxjHARiKBTINEAAYgAQYsAMYQxiKBUikBVD2BFj2BHABeAGQAQCYAQCgAQCqAQC4AQPIAQD4AQGYAgGgAgWYAwCIBgGQBgqSBwExoAcA%26sclient%3Dgws-wiz-serp) ### Comment > AdGuard (I assume DNS filtering) breaks this sponsored Google search result. I encounter this somewhat often (regularly enough to be an annoyance). I remember a non-sponsored site also not working another time due to in-between tracking URLs, but I don't recall which page so have no proof of it ever happening. > > In my opinion, if an ad (or sponsored search result, which I have enabled in my AdGuard settings) shows up it should also work. The g2a website itself is not blocked, it is just one or more tracking pages in between that are. Username: `@Hedge4` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ke9aljl765cksks8so4wcws8oc4gwswq35ymae6ni8.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/eno7c2xk81kw44goosgoc4kggc0ogokoxzhopng0kg.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ge58h2crtjww0k4sskocow8ckc8wos05nx0uwdi6tk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.19.0 (4853) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.22631.0 Browser: | Chrome License type: | free AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `AdGuard DNS Filter`, `User DNS filter (url: none)` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

Language-specific:
AdGuard Dutch Custom filters: | User filter (url: none) Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | enabled Userscripts: | AdGuard Assistant (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js)
AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)
AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js) Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://www.google.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2F) Other extensions used: | Irrelevant. Disabling Adguard solves the problem so it is definitely at fault. ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=true&custom_filters=User%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520DNS%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=15&dns.servers=System&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdGuard%2520Assistant%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fassistant%2F4.3%2Fassistant.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.3.8.10&license_type=free&product_type=Win&product_version=7.19.0+%284853%29&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2F&scheme_version=2&stealth.enabled=false&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.22631.0&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dg2a%26sca_esv%3Da0b6cc145a6c8085%26sxsrf%3DADLYWIIhIi9vVmvxvpiIPbYtU6m5yFqLrw%253A1730942434582%26ei%3D4hUsZ5alI7KIi-gPkdSkoAo%26ved%3D0ahUKEwiWnsKHh8mJAxUyxAIHHREqCaQQ4dUDCA8%26uact%3D5%26oq%3Dg2a%26gs_lp%3DEgxnd3Mtd2l6LXNlcnAiA2cyYTIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzIKEAAYsAMY1gQYRzITEC4YgAQYsAMY0QMYQxjHARiKBTINEAAYgAQYsAMYQxiKBUikBVD2BFj2BHABeAGQAQCYAQCgAQCqAQC4AQPIAQD4AQGYAgGgAgWYAwCIBgGQBgqSBwExoAcA%26sclient%3Dgws-wiz-serp&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%29+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Chrome%2F130.0.0.0+Safari%2F537.36&utm_campaign=report&utm_medium=assistant&utm_source=win&win.wfp=true)

issue.title: kinogo.ec
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://kinogo.ec/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fkinogo.ec%2F) ### Comment > Проверила все настройки, и в доступ у сафари и в самом приложении. comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
